name: In re ESTATE of John DuPUY, Deed of Trust. Appeal of John DuPUY

parties: In re ESTATE of John DuPUY, Deed of Trust. Appeal of John DuPUY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County is affirmed. Each party is to pay costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John M. Kish, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert D. Ferguson, Tucker, Arensberg, Very & Ferguson, Pittsburgh, for Pittsburgh National Bank, appellee.
William D. Sutton, Louise W. Yoder, Thorp, Reed & Armstrong, Pittsburgh, for Alma DuPuy, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 206
In re ESTATE of John DuPUY, Deed of Trust. Appeal of John DuPUY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 24, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
John M. Kish, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert D. Ferguson, Tucker, Arensberg, Very & Ferguson, Pittsburgh, for Pittsburgh National Bank, appellee.
William D. Sutton, Louise W. Yoder, Thorp, Reed & Armstrong, Pittsburgh, for Alma DuPuy, appellee.
